name: Ext_R5_Device_pr_value
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Device.property.value[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Device.property.value[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The value of the property specified by the associated property.type code.
element.comment: `Device.property.value[x]` maps to R4B `Device.property.valueQuantity`. Type `CodeableConcept` has no mapping Type `string` has no mapping Type `boolean` has no mapping Type `integer` has no mapping Type `Range` has no mapping Type `Attachment` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo. `Device.property.value[x]` maps to R4B `Device.property.valueCode`. Type `Quantity` has no mapping Type `string` has no mapping Type `boolean` has no mapping Type `integer` has no mapping Type `Range` has no mapping Type `Attachment` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.
